density-block-based: Density Search Mode (Long range, statistic based search)
node: Node Search Mode (Medium range, exact search)
closest-ore-not-found: No ore found in {0} block radius.
borehole-no-filter: Borehole has not been configured to search for either type
borehole-sample-upside: Bore samples can only be taken from upper side of the block
stone: Stone Mode (Long range, distance search for stone)
area-sample: Area sample taken for a radius of {0}:
debug-bad-ppws-key: [BetterEr Prospecting] Found ore keys not in the ppws prospectable list. Is it intentional ? : {0}
AtLeastOne: At least one must be selected
OneShotDensity-description: Has no impact if new density is enabled
NewDensityMode-description: Replaces vanilla mode with the new density mode
NewDensityDmg-description: Tool damage for new density mode
LinearDensityScaling-description: Makes vanilla propick readings scale linearly (0-1) instead of the default 0-0.75 range. This affects all propick readings, not just the new density mode. Works instantly. Always enabled for new density mode
AddProximityMode-description: Enables proximity mode. Looks for closest ore. Sphere-based
ProximitySearchRadius-description: I'd recommend low values to leave node mode useful (if enabled )
ProximityVagueDescriptors-description: Writes yes/no messages when using proximity prospecting instead of exact block count to nearest ore
AddStoneMode-description: Enable big range stone search mode with exact distance to block. Sphere-based
StonePercentSearch-description: If enabled, stone mode displays percentage of found rocks relative to total found rocks. Immersion hurrah
AddBoreHoleMode-description: A straight-line mode. Only reports when breaking the top of the block, scans the world until the bottom and reports selected blocks ( Any or both of Ore and Stone blocks )
BoreholeRadius-description: Radius for borehole mode. 0 Makes a line
